A C E F G M P R S T 

P

playComputer() - Method in class com.company.PlayingSystem
Simple computer playing method which works randomly every time .
Player - Class in com.company
This class is used for showing a player in the game .It has a unicode which is the color for all of the tokens added to board , and list of all tokens added .
Player(String) - Constructor for class com.company.Player
Makes a new player with given color unicode .
PlayingSystem - Class in com.company
This is the most important class in the structure of this game .It controls the process of playing such as changing turns , adding tokens , checking if there is a winning , checking if there is a tie , rotating blocks and computers playing functions .
PlayingSystem() - Constructor for class com.company.PlayingSystem
Makes a new playing system with 2 players .
playTurn() - Method in class com.company.PlayingSystem
Controls over turns changing process and change turns .
printBoard() - Method in class com.company.PlayingSystem
Prints the board with tokens in it .
printData() - Method in class com.company.PlayingSystem
Prints data of playing system such as each block tokens and all tokens .
printMenu() - Method in class com.company.PlayingSystem
Prints the menu for the start of game .
